title: dhEvi padham paNindhEn
sahitya:
dEvi paadam paNindEn - anavaradam varadE para

(dEvi)



anupallavi



kaaviyaar nilangaL soozhum naagai

kaayarOhanesham nEyamoDu magizh tooyavaDivu koL

(dEvi)



caraNam



aar tuNaippaarambaa inda ulaginil

aadaravay unadu aDiyavaralatanai

paarppavara avar pashi teerppavara avar koDum

paavi enRu neeyum taLLi viDaadE

paadi madi nanmuDi meedil oLiravaNi

paarvadi aDiyavar aarvamoDi paNiyum

paada malarai oru pOdum idaya

maRavaada varamauLa puraari yiDamamarum

(dEvi)
